verses.roman:
'uṭha', 'uṭha' bali' more bale bāra bāra
uṭhi' tāṅra rūpa dekhi' hainu camatkāra

synonyms: uṭha uṭha—get up, get up; bali'-saying; more—unto me; bale—says; bāra bāra—again and again; uṭhi'-getting up; tāṅra—His; rūpa dekhi'-seeing the beauty; hainu—became; camatkāra—astonished.
translation: "Arise! Get up!" He told me again and again. Upon rising, I was greatly astonished to see His beauty.
